Text: The Movie Is Clean And Sober Fer those Curious To know
A 124 min film in 334MiB? How does that look like?!

...probably like "320x240" Nice for your ipod, I guess.

...not so "clean" picture, and a rather "sober"ing experience. ;-)

Sorry 'bout the goof on the title folks! :) Yes, it is "Clean & Sober" & yes, it is intended for portable xvid devices, which, unfortunately, the ipod video isn't compatible with.

*sigh*

Tuberok

PS:  The quality is pretty good even for 320x240.  It's great for portable dvd players, smartphones, pda's & other portable devices that support the xvid format.  I'd say it's about vhs extended play quality if you play it back on a tv or computer screen.
pps:  it's also available in ~ 885mb format if  you prefer better quality and don't mind the extra size and download time.  just click on 'tuberok' above if you want to find that version.
